analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule, by exempting “policy-influencing” positions from 5 U.S.C. Chapters 43 and 75—destroys that foundation.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of due process protections and merit-based evaluations, highlighting concerns about arbitrary and politically motivated removals, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and politicization.
